con:config.script:
String dir = new File(testRunner.getTestCase().getTestSuite().getProject().getPath()+"${File.separator}data${File.separator}ForeignAccountScenarios.xlsx") log.info "dir---$dir" testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("DataSourcePath",dir)
import java.io.File File f1 = new File(dir); if(f1.exists()) log.info "file exists"
log.info f1.getParentFile()

con:config.con:query: select T.transactionsid, T.paymentstatus, T.initiatorbankid,P.FOREIGNACCOUNTTYPE, T.debetaccountno,T.processingbankorgid, T.ispc, T.paymenttype, T.marketproductname, T.fk_paymentinfoid, T.fk_processinglineid, P.FOREIGNACCOUNTFILEFORMAT from (transactions T inner join paymentinfo P on T.fk_paymentinfoid = P.paymentinfoid) where transactionsid in ('${PaymentApprove#Response#declare namespace ns3='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0'; //ns3:PaymentApproveResponse[1]/ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult[1]/ns2:transactionId[1]}')
